title: Cardano Takes The Lead With Groundbreaking Development Activity — Can ADA Price Go To $12? - ZyCrypto
content:
Advertisement

The latest data demonstrates that Cardano is making headways in the cryptosphere. Cardano has topped all other crypto projects, becoming the blockchain with the most significant development activity.

This is a huge feat for the so-called Ethereum killer. Interestingly, Ethereum held the tenth position in terms of developer activity.

Cardano Leads The Pack In Dev Activity

Recent data from Santiment revealed that Cardano has successfully usurped Polkadot (DOT) and Kusama, taking the lead as the blockchain with the highest development activity taking place in its public GitHub repositories.

Cardano recorded 611.47 notable GitHub commits over the past 30 days to lead other projects. Polkadot and Kusama have each recorded 500.67 GitHub commits during the same period, tying for second place.

The impressive development activity shows the confidence that developers have in the potential of the Cardano blockchain. It also reassures investors that the network is headed in the right direction.

Advertisement

It’s pertinent to note that as developers remain active in deploying new projects and features on the Cardano network, the result will be expanded utility, which, in turn, drives mainstream adoption.

Potential ADA Price Rally To $12

Despite the extraordinary achievements, the price action of Cardano’s native coin, ADA, has been underwhelming in 2023. ADA has lost 1.5% of its value at publication time, changing hands at $0.247, according to CoinGecko data. Per the weekly chart, the token has lost 6.8%. Even worse, ADA is down by over 92% from its all-time high of $3.09, registered in September 2021.

In light of the robust developer activities, the ongoing debate among crypto insiders suggests a potential ADA price revival, potentially hitting the $8 and $12 range in an ultra-bullish market scenario.

However, to solidify its position and potentially surpass $12 at the end of the next bull market, Cardano needs to continue growing and delivering on its promises, including the planned updates for 2023.

title: Introducing the AssetX Ambassador Program: Bridging Expertise and Blockchain Innovation - BSC NEWS
content:
WEB3

The program aims to build a community of blockchain enthusiasts and marketers to contribute to the growth of the AssetX platform.

AssetX is dedicated to offering marketers and crypto enthusiasts a chance to showcase their expertise in the blockchain industry and earn rewards for their efforts. As such, they are pleased to announce their Ambassador program!

The AssetX core team has crafted the Ambassador Program to unite individuals who have carved a niche for themselves in the crypto space. The initiative seeks ambassadors capable of propelling the AssetX project into the limelight, ensuring they reach a diverse and broad audience.

To become an AssetX Ambassador, one needs to have an established social media presence, a basic comprehension of marketing, be professional, write authentic content, and have an engaging online presence. In summary, here is a list of attributes every AssetX Ambassador must possess:

Basic Comprehension of Marketing : Understanding marketing strategies and applications.

: Understanding marketing strategies and applications. Gather Insights and Report Back : Ability to collect data, analyze, and provide feedback.

: Ability to collect data, analyze, and provide feedback. Engaging Online Presence : Maintain a lively and interactive online presence.

: Maintain a lively and interactive online presence. Professionalism : Uphold professional conduct in all interactions and promotions. Community

: Uphold professional conduct in all interactions and promotions. Community Leadership : Ability to guide and lead your community effectively.

: Ability to guide and lead your community effectively. Authentic Excitement: Genuine enthusiasm and excitement about the AssetX project. If you are confident about having the attributes, you are one step closer to becoming an ambassador!

How to Join the Ambassador Program

Aspiring ambassadors are tasked with specific responsibilities to ensure the coherent and ethical promotion of AssetX. Here’s how one can participate:

Apply to become an AssetX Ambassador by filling out the form HERE.

Promote AssetX within your communities via your established social media presence. (NOTE: Do not “shill,” but rather inform.)

Encourage users to join the AssetX Telegram group: https://t.me/AssetXOfficial

Teach inexperienced users of BNB Chain how to use the network.

Engage with AssetX news and posts across their social media pages, including Twitter, Medium, and Telegram.

Be present and engage with each other and interact with users within the AssetX Telegram and other social channels.

Rewards and Support

As stated above, selected ambassadors will be duly rewarded upon successfully performing the required tasks. Here’s a snapshot of the rewards and support one can expect as an AssetX Ambassador:

Direct one-to-one contact with the AssetX core team.

AssetX's native $ASX tokens paid up to 10,000 $ASX (~ $1000 at TGE) over three months per ambassador.

AssetX is a revolutionary platform for investors, and they are pleased to invite you to become part of their Decentralized Finance (DeFi) ecosystem. As an ambassador, you not only stand the chance to earn rewards but also gain exposure to the robust investing portfolios when holding $ASX. Further, $ASX holders will earn $USDC reflections.

In conclusion, the AssetX Ambassador Program is not just a campaign but a community where blockchain enthusiasts, marketers, and experts converge to foster the growth of their revolutionary platform. Your expertise and promotional efforts will be rewarded and contribute significantly to building a robust DeFi ecosystem with AssetX. Join them and become a pivotal part of this exciting journey into the future of decentralized finance!

Join the community here:

Twitter | Telegram | Website
